{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.10383v1", "title": "A monotonicity formula for a semilinear fractional parabolic equation", "summary": "By applying a high-dimensional parabolic-to-elliptic transformation, we
establish a monotonicity formula for the extension problem of the fractional
parabolic semilinear equation $(\partial_t -\Delta)^s u = |u|^{p-1}u$, where
$0<s<1$. This is an analogous result to the Giga-Kohn monotonicity formula for
the equation $\partial_t u - \Delta u = |u|^{p-1}u.$", "main_category": "math.AP", "categories": "math.AP", "published": "2025-04-14T16:28:09Z"}
